subject: Order #SSN4056
description_text:
Hi there,

I placed an order yesterday for a GT2 steering wheel, I thought I added x2 QR to the order but did not see them on the confirmation email I received this morning.
Can you please confirm if x2 Quick releases were added to the order.

Cheers,
David Slute
